chapter.pericope: Yahweh Is King Over All the Earth

ul.li1: 1Yahweh is king; he clothes himself with majesty.
Yahweh clothes himself; he girds himself with might.
Yes, the world is established so that it will not be moved.
2Your throne is established from of old;
3The rivers have lifted up, O Yahweh;
the rivers have lifted up their rumbling;Literally “voice”
the rivers have lifted up their pounding.
4Mightier than the rumblings of many waters,
mightier than the mighty breakers of the sea,
Holiness is fitting for your house,Or “temple”
O Yahweh, forever.Literally “for a length of days”
